title: U.S. stock futures rebound as global coronavirus cases continue to rise
text: U.S. stock futures shook off early declines and rose late Sunday as new global coronavirus cases reached a single-day record high.

title: Dollar holds gains as fear of renewed pandemic gathers pace
text: The U.S. dollar touched a three-week high and commodity currencies were stalled on Monday, as renewed worries about a second wave of coronavirus infections sent investors into safer assets.

title: Blame the Fed for the disconnect in the markets: Bianco

title: Oil edges up on tighter supply, but demand concerns check gains
text: Oil prices nudged higher on Monday on tighter supplies from major producers, but concerns that a record rise in global coronavirus cases could curb a recovery in fuel demand checked gains.

title: U.S. stock futures fall as infections spike hits confidence
text: U.S. stock futures dropped in early Asian trade on Monday as rising coronavirus cases in the United States raised more doubts about a quick economic rebound from the massive downturn triggered by the pandemic.

title: Mega Tech Stocks Seen as Defensive Plays: Wells Fargo AM

title: Trump says he held off on China sanctions because of trade deal: report
text: President Donald Trump said he did not sanction China for building mass-detention camps for Uighurs and other ethnic minorities because doing so would have jeopardized the trade deal signed in January, Axios reported Sunday.
